categories: Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Cason was a male Human who was a supply officer in the Imperial Military of the Sith Empire. He was stationed on the planet Balmorra during the Cold War.

Cason was originally to introduce a mission on Balmorra, but the mission was cut before Star Wars: The Old Republic was released. His dialogue remains in the game's text files, and should have been voiced by Troy Hall.
